values.value:
Handles converting a range of hourly rate strings in $[d][d] per hour format, with an optional decimal place. The string "per hour" is required after the second hourly rate in the string, but not the first. Below are examples (not an exhaustive list) of strings it will handle.
$50 - $100 per hour $50 per hour - $100 per hour $50.50 per hour - $100.50 per hour $50 - $100.50 per hour
